verbs.description: President Donald Trump [V: is] trying to hit reset at the State Department on the eve of a critical decision on the Iran nuclear deal and a potential summit with North Korean leader Kim Jong Un .

[ARG0: President Donald Trump] is [V: trying] [ARG1: to hit reset at the State Department on the eve of a critical decision on the Iran nuclear deal and a potential summit with North Korean leader Kim Jong Un] .

[ARG0: President Donald Trump] is trying to [V: hit] [ARG1: reset] [ARGM-LOC: at the State Department] [ARGM-TMP: on the eve of a critical decision on the Iran nuclear deal and a potential summit with North Korean leader Kim Jong Un] .
